entry.title: RT _Checkɱate 🟠🔑⚡☢️🛢️: On the Price multiplier effect for #Bitcoin, we can look at how much capital flows into the Realized Cap per unit...
entry.summary: RT _Checkɱate 🟠🔑⚡☢️🛢️ On the Price multiplier effect for #Bitcoin, we can look at how much capital flows into the Realized Cap per unit change in Market cap. We estimate a multiplier effect of around 4-5x by this model using on-chain data. cc @yassineARK @adam3us https://insights.glassnode.com/the-realized-cap-foundation/

entry.title: With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
entry.summary:
With Privacy as an emerging primitive keep an eye on @silentdao_ in 2024
Crypto, Distilled: $ETH killers were the sweetest fruit of 2021. 2024’s golden goose could be very different. Emerging Primitives: - Autonomous Economic Agents (AEAs) - AiDeFi (+ other DeAi verticals) - DePIN (storage, GPU, etc.) - Privacy-Enabled Infrastructure - Modular Blockchains + DA -…
